attributes.action: The EU referendum result should be subject to a judicial review.
attributes.background:
The method of presenting  facts, to the public, to enable an informed decision to be made and vote was flawed.
16-18 year olds , the channel islands , isle of man should have all been able to vote in the EU referendum.

rejection.details:
Judicial review is a court process. The courts are responsible for it. You can read more about judicial review here:

https://www.judiciary.gov.uk/you-and-the-judiciary/judicial-review/
